source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: Swift & Firebase Building an impressive Realtime Drawing app

visible_instructors.title: Icaro Lavrador
visible_instructors.job_title: React, JavaScript, Node, Swift Expert | 25+ years Experience
visible_instructors.name: Icaro

items.headline: Build your own Real time app using Swift & Firebase where multiple users can share their drawings  instantly worldwide.
objectives_summary: Everything you need to know to build this app in Firebase 2.4
How to use stack view the new layout designer in iOS 9
The secrets about notification, how to send userInfo to all the app

items.title: Learn Android the Easy Way: Build a Real App
items.headline: Learn the Fundamentals of Android App Development and how to build TaskNote App
objectives_summary: You Will Build A Real World TaskNote Android App Using AndroidX, SQLite, ListView, CursorAdapter
Create Restful Api with Spring, JPA and MySQL
Integrate Login Api using Volley with Android App

items.title: Android UI/UX for Developers: Build Amazing & Beautiful Apps
items.headline: After this course you will be able to design amazing android apps with a good user interfaces and material design
objectives_summary: After this course i promise you will be able to create amazing android apps with beautiful user interfaces and material design
You will learn how to create custom views
You will learn how to use all types of layouts

items.title: Hands-On Kotlin Web Development with Ktor
items.headline: Build web apps quickly and with less effort using Kotlin and Ktor
objectives_summary: Understand the Ktor lifecycle, and how to install and configure Ktor features
Implement a JSON typesafe backend based on Ktor features
Organize your code in routes and in multiple Kotlin files

items.title: iOS 12 & Swift 4.2 - Complete Developer Course
items.headline: A Complete iOS 12 and Xcode 10 Course with Swift 4.2
objectives_summary: Full understanding of Xcode 10 and all it has to offer
Learn how to program for IOS 12 to create your own apps
Create fully featured games

items.title: Learn the Swift Programming Language Step by Step
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of Apples new and intuitive programming language Swift!
objectives_summary: Understand the core concepts of the Swift Programming Language
Over 28 Lectures and 2.5 Hours of Content!

items.title: Xamarin iOS App in C# & Firebase
items.headline: Developing a complete iPhone application using C Sharp in Xamarin Studio with Firebase backend
objectives_summary: Full fledged iOS development of a grocery list app
Various outlets and dynamic interface development
Backend database using Firebase

items.title: iOS 13 & Swift 5: Build an Onboarding, Login/Sign-up flow
items.headline: Develop a highly reusable skeleton app with an effective onboarding and sign up flow using Firebase Authentication
objectives_summary: Core skills to building a re-useable skeleton app from scratch
Learn to integrate Firebase Authentication SDK
Manage user sessions with Firebase Authentication

items.title: Create Android and iOS App using HTML, CSS and JS
items.headline: Start developing apps for Android & iOS just by writing code using HTML, CSS and JS with the Ionic Framework.
objectives_summary: Set up development environment for Ionic Framework
Download and Install Ionic Framework and Prerequisites
Understand Basic Ionic Templates

items.title: Android with PHP and MySQL
items.headline: Build LogIn & Registration App With Android ,PHP & MySQL
objectives_summary: Build android app
Save data from android to PHP MySQL
Get data from PHP MySQL to android

items.title: Make Android Apps with Source Code - Power Workshop Series
items.headline: Learn Android Mobile Application Design and Development using Application Source Codes
objectives_summary: Understand How Actual App Development Works
Create Your Own Applications Inspired by Provided Source Codes

items.title: Xamarin - deliver native apps for iOS, Android and Windows
items.headline: Write code once - use C# to develop mobile applications from zero to deployment
objectives_summary: Developing Xamarin.Android apps
Developing Xamarin.iOS apps
Shared code overview - Shared Project

items.title: Ionic 4 Mega Course: Build 10 Real World Apps
items.headline: Build 10 real world mobile apps using Ionic 4
objectives_summary: Ionic 4 framework
Build 10 real world mobile apps
Learn to use plugins like File, MediaCapture, VideoEditor, WebView, StreamingMedia etc.

items.title: Dart Simplified : Beginners guide.
items.headline: Google dart from absolute beginner to writing your own code.
objectives_summary: Dart programming from basic to advance.
Google dart in detail.
Dart required for flutter.

items.title: iOS 13 & Swift 5: Build Beautiful Onboarding/Landing Screens
items.headline: Develop stunning first impressions that capture your users' attention. Includes Combine framework & Lottie animations
objectives_summary: Build beautiful onboarding screens
Integrate Lottie (AirBNB) animations
Managing app states using Combine framework

items.title: Projects in Android
items.headline: Learn Android Development building 10 Projects
objectives_summary: Learn Android Development
Master the most commonly used Android APIs
Learn both Android Studio and Eclipse ADT
